overview: They're hot, they're hung, they're handsome…and they're street smart. These sexy French toughs know how to work the streets of Paris to get whatever they want — and what they want most is SEX. There's plenty of it right here — from the lower levels of an underground auto park to the upper floors of a fashionable left bank apartment — all hard action and all exposed with the unique Cadinot touch.
tagline: See how the sexy French do it!
title: Street Smart
